name: Skyrim Extended Cut - Saints and Seducers

files.name: Ruin's Edge
files.fomod: Install with default texture. Choose 'Balanced' version.

files.name: Shadowrend
files.fomod: Select 'Hardcore rebalance' during FOMOD. Uncheck 'Craftable option'.

files.name: Staff of Sheogorath
files.fomod: Enable lore-friendly voices. Leave texture pack at '2K'.
